patthana8.45:1.1: Naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.45:2.1: Nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.45:3.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
